Studio Art Projects

These are drawings produced during my Drawing course in Spring 2021.

How To Get Over There

Experiments with different materials and media.

  • Materials and Media

Anatomical Collage

These five drawings were used to progressively build skills in my introductory Drawing course.

  • Composition
  • Patterns
  • Value
  • Anatomy

Little River Canyon in Gauche

These two drawings were produced as part of an artist study. I studied Jem Magbanua's style and incorporated her use of gauche and geometry into these works.

  • Color
  • Lighting & Shadows
  • Perspective

Phytoplankton Botanicals

These drawings were produced in a botanical illustration study in the style of Sara Boccaccini Meadows. Phytoplankton are a break from typical botanical illustration subjects.

  • Scale
  • Rhythm and Balance
  • Color

Collages

An exercise with using paper cut with a Silhouette machine to create layered collages.

  • Cutting Machines
  • Layering
